Journal Publications
######################

**Papers submitted or in revision:**
#.	Lu, Y., Shi, F., Kirby, J. T., and Feng, W., "A two-layer model for oblique internal hydraulic jumps generated by a sharp lateral consriction", Submitted to Journal of Fluid Mechanics, in revision, Jan 2018
#. Orzech, M.D., Shi, F.,  Bateman, S.,  Veeramony, J.,  Calantoni, J.,  and Kirby, T.J., A coupled system for investigating the physics of wave-ice interactions, submitted to Journal of Atmospheric and Oceanic Technology, Nov, 2017.
#. Wargula, A., Raubenheimer, B., Elgar, S., Chen, J.-L., Shi, F., and Traykovski, P., "Flow asymmetry owing to inertia and waves on an unstratified, shallow ebb shoal", submitted to Journal of Geophysical Research: Oceans, Nov, 2017
#. Schambach, L., Grilli, S. T., Kirby, J. T., and Shi, F., "Landslide tsunami hazard along the upper US East Coast: effects of slide rheology and bottom friction", 
#. Lu, Y., Shi, F., Kobayashi, N., Malej, M., Zhu, T., and Feng, W., "Numerical investigation of excessive surge induced by wave overtopping in an inlet-bay system", Submitted to Coastal Engineering, Jan, 2018.
